column2: You recieve news that a massive white whale has been sinking your whaling vessels and is disrupting your trade with the other Norscan tribes!
Your men ready the longboats, loading them with spears and harpoons. Hopefully it will be enough to kill the beast.
We shall hunt the beast down! Ready the longboats!
Call back our remaining whaling vessels.
You send out word that all remaining whaling vessels are to return to the village immediately. Hopefully the beast will lose interest and wander off.
You Set sail out onto the open ocean
There is no honor in retreat.
